tags: None
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review:
He listened to every symptoms with patience and explained all the possibilities for the pain. Then, he suggested few tests and even explained in details the rationale behind such tests. After checking all reports he suggested  few medicines related to Vit d and HG deficiency. 
Even, he suggested to take advise from a General Physician for more clarity as the chest pain is not related to heart.
Overall, he is very patient, polite, listens to patients carefully, explains the cause in details, advises fewer tests and medicines. Even you can reach him anytime in emergency.
A very good and approachable cadiologist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am very grateful to Dr. Ashwin Daware for taking such excellent care of my father. He provided detailed explanation of the treatment and remained very communicative throughout the process. I could reach out to him anytime of the day. Having him around made all of us feel very comfortable and relieved. SkyMedical has been a very useful and unique medical service, making healthcare so transparent and easily accessible to patients. SkyMedical has indeed made an innovative mark in this era of digitization. Wishing Dr. Ashwin and SkyMedical all the very best in their endeavours.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I booked a session at 12.40 P.M with the doctor, for fast and irregular heart rhythm, which he had to postpone to 5.10 P.M due to some emergency surgery he had to take care of. But, he personally called me and explained why he had to do that and asked me if I was okay with the new timing. Once I visited I had to wait for just 10-15 mins. Once he examined me he suggested ECG and Echo after checking which he told my heart was perfectly alright and the change in the pace of heart was probably just stress. He gave some tablet to bring down the heart rate. Now I'm feeling good. I would recommend this doctor.

-Sathwik
reply_text: Thanks for understanding satvik. Have a great day ahead

tags: None
review:
Visited Narayana Whitefield for My Fathers routine health Checkup in Nov-2015 
After getting checkup report reception ask us to show this reports to different department specialist like cardiac, Internal Medicine & ENT etc. 
Unfortunately(yes) we met doctor Ashiwn M Daware. He checked reports and he say that "I found something unusual in ECG go for Coronary Angiography which cost 9K . " he said it's our decision he suggested us to go for it. 
We went back to home and decided to go for Angiography . After getting Angiography he said he did not find anything in the report in which he was interested and suggested to go for angioplasty.
we were bit confused as he could not show up anything in the report while asking about report (no blockage) 
as my Parent stays in Rajasthan and had to leave Bangalore next day we informed patient is going tomorrow and you write what is your suggestion we will consult there.
as soon as we said this he changed his statement he said your blockage is less then 20 % and an adult 40 years normal person would have more blockage then him and just suggested to meet any cardio every six month .

Then recently(July-2016) we met another doctor in Indore for health checkup he laughed why did we come for the consultation and who asked to do all this reports ( Angio) 
He analyzed the report done in Bangalore and said the first checkup report itself suggest nothing is there and there was no need to go for Angio.

I would surely not recommend Dr. Ashwin , if he suggested for anything like Angio then go for alternate consultation  not to just save money but to avoid unnecessary mental trauma

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We met Dr. Ashwin for my father's Fluctuating blood pressure around August 2019.It was touching ~186/100.We were particularly impressed with the amount of time doctor spent with us and his availability at all times.I would like to share an incident as well.My father's blood pressure started reaching > 180/96, at that time we called the doctor on his personal number.Not only did he suggest the medicine to lower the BP immediately, but came to his clinic as well on a holiday.Later he called us back again the next morning the check on my father.I would highly recommend Dr. Ashwin for any kind of Fluctuating Blood pressure problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,Blocked Blood Vessels,
review: I have visited doctor Aswin M Daware for my father high BP issues and weakness around chest area.Doctor was very cool & patient , he listened to all the problems that my father was facing and suggested necessary checkups.he explained the main cause of the problem very clearly & prescribed medication. now my father is feeling better.The doctor is available over the phone for  any kind of queries anytime which made me very happy.The doctor is very polite.I strongly recommend this doctor to my friends and family members.

tags: None
review:
Hello,

This is my first ever feedback that I share online. And this is because that after 20 years I have found  a doctor who is exactly like the ones who was  a family when we were kids. My Dad had some heart complaints and we had already done angiography , shown to various doctors, etc. Dr Daware was the first doctor who could pin point that dad never had an heart issue, it was a pulmonology issue. Not only did he guide us to different doctor, he took time to collate and check their reports also and guided us with humongous patience.  That is great ,,but the surprising bit is, when dad came back after one and half years for re-evaluation , he actually remembered the entire case details.  And my parents now will not even let any medication happen without his consent. My experience is he is  exactly the doctor that you have read in books about :) :) !!!

tags: None
review: Twice we had gone, and twice we could not actually see the doctor..he had given us the appointment and when we were there, he just left for some procedure..First time some junior dr visited and we were not satisfied. Second time we actually fought and so we were asked to  wait and he came ..but he was just checking for the sake of duty. It was not satisfying at all. He asked us to take some tests and show the reports. Until today we are not able to meet him to show the report...We took two appointments again for showing the reports and both were cancelled...Such a disappointing experience!!!!

tags: None
review:
I am seeing doctor Ashwin from past 3 years for my regular health checkups.** ****** *** ******** ********* ** *** ** ****** *** ***** *** *********He listens to the patient clearly and asks the details in depth for any issue they are facing.
 He is the right kind of doctor for people who are having cardio issues, he studies patients carefully and the best thing he does is he educate his patients.With that he want the patient to be self Caring about themselves and he is available over the call and message anytime the patient needs.I would recommend Dr Ashwin strongly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very friendly doctor.  Helpful nature, what's important is he listens to the issue patiently. Does not seem to be in a hurry to instruct variety of test. Suggests only required tests. Explains issue well. 
We had good experience. 
- Pradnya Shashank

tags: Wait time,
review: Went to the Clinic but did not consult the doctor. The doctor went out for rounds in some other hospital though we had appointment. That can be accepted as doctors do need to go for rounds. However the main reason why we left the place was the attitude of the receptionist. The receptionist was rude with not only us but even other patients and was making signs and remarks which is not acceptable. No one is visiting the clinic free of cost. Get a well behaved receptionist first

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Raghvendra M Kamat

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had gone for chest pain. Dr Ashwin listened to my problem in detail nd then only prescribed the needed tests. He explained me why we do these test. My test results for ECG, 2D nd TMT were normal. He personally looks into yr issue nd no unwanted charges were taken.

Was relaxed after he assured that everything is fine, no medication was prescribed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Went for a second opinion. And doctors explanation and diagnosis was to the point and exact. He even consoled saying that the hole is not a big issue, which I didn't get in my first opinion. And he spends ample time for each consultation. Thanks doctor. Go to doctor for cardiac problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited doctor Aswin M Daware with my father full body check reports for the feedback and totally impressed with his diagnosis.He was very cool & patient. He explained clearly evrything and infact shared his friends number who is a pulmanologist for further reference. The doctor is very friendly,interactive, patient and polite. I strongly recomment this doctor to my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Really admire Dr.Ashwin more as a Lovely Human than an Interventional Cardiologist for sure :) He values the Human Values which is indeed precious and priceless !

The comfort zone is absolutely awesome and he makes you at ease being an excellent listener and understands the Patient's wellbeing first and foremost!

He treats each and everyone of his patient as a friend which adds to his Success rate !

He personally did the Echo 2D test for me and the TMT test which is very much appreciated and highly commendable !

Must confess that I am truly wholeHEARTedly blessed to be in the safe hands of Dr.Ashwin for sure by the grace of Almighty for sure !

A Friend in NEED is a Friend INDEED...

HEALTH is WEALTH.

God Bless ! Stay Blessed !

Some more tests were recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is good but , reception team is very bad . Charging fee for lab test depends on the person. Ex.initially one test they told me Rs1000/- after the test they charged Rs1500/-
reply_text:
Thanks sir. Please let me know which test you did in our center which had differtial pricing. We follow a very transparent pricing policy. I will rectify immediately if you have any concerns in that sir. 
Thanks.
We offer lot of our services on discounted rates. You have corporate discounts if you are eligible. Also we give discount on loyalty scheme if you take which saves lot of money .
Please contact me for further clarification.
Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Aswin sir's way of explaining, dealing the situation with patient is excellent. The way he has done the angioplasty to me by motivating me is unforgettable. Post procedure explanation and dealing me is also very good. I think this might be the reason why I am not leaving him since from last 3 years. I thank to him and wishing him all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited the clinic for heart care counselling. The doctor is in hurry and did not listen to my questions at all and asked me to do additional tests. I waited there for 2 hours on a Saturday morning and the actual time spent with the doctor is less than 6 mins. I don't recommend.
reply_text: I am extremely sorry for the experience you had at our clinic. Saturday was too much rush and that's why probably I couldn't spend much time with you in initial visit. Many times for proper counselling we require much more data. It is my earnest effort to make patients aware about the clinical problem and impart health education so as to make our patients more knowledgeable that the others. Sometime even after efforts we fall short. I apologise for the inconvenience you had. We will rectify the process flow. Thank you for your constructive feedback. Regards. Dr Ashwin.
